qas.question: Name a film role that Madonna acted in.
Which movie earned Madonna a Golden Globe Award?
Name one of Madonna's other business ventures?
What is the name of the entertainment company that Madonna founded?
Which year did Madonna sign a $120 million deal with Live Nation?

context: Madonna's popularity was further enhanced by her film roles, including <a0_0>Desperately Seeking Susan<a0_0/> (1985), Dick Tracy (1990), and <a1_0>Evita<a1_0/> (1996); the latter earned her a Golden Globe Award for Best Actress. However, most of her other films have been panned by critics. Her other ventures include <a2_0>fashion design<a2_0/>, writing children's books, and filmmaking. She has been acclaimed as a businesswoman, particularly after she founded entertainment company <a3_0>Maverick<a3_0/> (including the label Maverick Records). In <a4_0>2007<a4_0/> she signed an unprecedented US $120 million 360 deal with Live Nation.
